rt

Interface Film

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoxFilterFilm

    public interface Film
    A film stores a 2D grid of Spectrum representing an image. Rendered samples can be added one by one to a film. Samples are filtered using some filter (depending on the implementation of this interface) when added.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSample(double x, double y, Spectrum s)
      Add a sample to the film at a specified floating point position.
      int getHeight()
      Returns height (in pixels) of film.
      Spectrum[][] getImage()
      Returns the image stored in the film.
      int getWidth()
      Returns width (in pixels) of film.

    • Method Detail

      • addSample

        void addSample(double x,
             double y,
             Spectrum s)
        Add a sample to the film at a specified floating point position. The position coordinates are assumed to be in image space.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate in image space
        y - y-coordinate in image space
        s - sample to be added

      • getImage

        Spectrum[][] getImage()
        Returns the image stored in the film.
        Returns:
        the image

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Returns width (in pixels) of film.
        Returns:
        width in pixels

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Returns height (in pixels) of film.
        Returns:
        height in pixels
